title: Potential Unauthorized Access Attempt
summary: Alex Kumar accessed multiple password reset pages. This indicates a possible brute-force attack or credential stuffing attempt, bypassing security measures. The access to admin AWS without a helpdesk ticket for a password issue is concerning.
investigation_steps: Investigate the origin of the login attempts, check for any unusual activity patterns.
Review AWS logs for any unauthorized actions.
Check if multi-factor authentication (MFA) was enabled during this event.
Inspect system logs for signs of credential stuffing or brute force attacks.
verdict: Immediate investigation required to secure the system and prevent potential data breach
